import sunny from './sunny.png' import axios from 'axios'; import './App.css'; import { UilMoon,UilSearch,UilWind,UilWater } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' const WeatherApp=()=>{ const fetchData = async () => { try { const city=document.getElementById('search'); // const response = await fetch (`http://localhost:3005/api/weather?city=${city.value}`)//('http://localhost:3005/api/weather'); const response = 'http://localhost:3007/api/weather'; axios.get(response, { params: { city: city }, }) const data = await response.json(); // Display the received data in the browser /*document.getElementById('weatherData').innerHTML = `

City: ${data.city}

Temperature: ${data.temperature} K

Weather Description: ${data.weatherDescription}

Wind Speed: ${data.windSpeed} m/s

`;*/ document.getElementById('top-degree').innerHTML= `${data.temperature}`;//code me // document.getElementById('weather-location').innerHTML = `${data.city}` document.getElementById('sun').innerHTML = `${data.weatherDescription}` document.getElementById('wind').innerHTML = "Wind: " + `${data.windSpeed}`+"mph" document.getElementById('humidity').innerHTML = `${data.humidityCheck}`; } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching weather data:', error.message); } }; //fetchData(); return (
